comInf

Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • comInf.Message
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Message
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Definition of the messages exchanged between clients and servers on this solution of the Restaurant's Problem, implementing the client-server model of type 2 (server replication) with static launching of the entities envolved. The communication is based on the exchange of object of type Message through a TCP channel.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Message

        public Message(int msgType)
        Message instantiation (type 1).
        Parameters:
        msgType - message type

      • Message

        public Message(int msgType,
               int secondArg,
               int type)
        Message instantiation (type 2).
        Parameters:
        msgType - message type
        secondArg - represents either the ID of a Student or the updated number of the course, depending on the type
        type - decides if secondArg is an ID (type = 1) or a course number (type = 2)

      • Message

        public Message(int msgType,
               int studentId,
               EntityStates.StudentState studentState)
        Message instantiation (type 3).
        Parameters:
        msgType - message type
        studentId - ID of the Student whos state may be updated
        studentState - (updated) state of the Student

      • Message

        public Message(int msgType,
               int studentId,
               EntityStates.StudentState studentState,
               EntityStates.ArrivalOrder arrivalOrder)
        Message instantiation (type 4).
        Parameters:
        msgType - message type
        studentId - ID of the Student whos state may be updated
        studentState - (updated) state of the Student
        arrivalOrder - place of arrival of the Student at the restaurant

        studentId - ID of the Student whos state may be updated

      • getStudentId

        public int getStudentId()
        Getter function to know the ID of the Student envolved in the message.
        Returns:
        Student's ID (or null if there is no Student envolved in the message)

      • getnCourse

        public int getnCourse()
        Getter function to know the updated course number
        Returns:
        new course number (or null if the message isn't updating the course number)

      • getWaiterAlternative

        public char getWaiterAlternative()
        Getter function to know the task to be done by the Waiter
        Returns:
        Waiter's task to be done (or null if the message isn't giving the Waiter a task to do)

      • getArrivalOrder

        public EntityStates.ArrivalOrder getArrivalOrder()
        Getter function to know the place of arrival of a Student.
        Returns:
